original_text: And the seven angels came out of the temple, having the seven plagues, clothed in pure and white linen, and having their breasts girded with golden girdles.
korean_text: 일곱 재앙을 가진 일곱 천사가 성전으로부터 나와 맑고 빛난 세마포 옷을 입고 가슴에 금 띠를 띠고

sentences.original_text: And the seven angels came out of the temple
clothed in pure and white linen
and having their breasts girded with golden girdles
